agent_connect_timeout.description: Amount of time in seconds that qubicle will wait for the agent to successfully answer a call.
agent_connect_timeout.name: Agent Connect Timeout

agent_wrapup_time.description: Pre-defined wait period applied after an agent handles a customer call
agent_wrapup_time.name: Agent Wrapup Time

moh.description: Media ID (or appropriate media URI) of media to play while caller is on hold.
moh.name: Moh

queue_name.description: A friendly name for the queue
queue_name.name: Name

queue_timeout.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that a call will wait in queue.
queue_timeout.name: Queue Timeout

strategy.description: The queue strategy for connecting agents to callers
strategy.name: Stategy
